hops.rawfrom: Tanya Rohauer/ENRON@enronXgate on 04/16/2001 02:34 PM?To: Pushkar Shahi/HOU/ECT@ECT?cc:  ?Subject: LIBOR derivation??Pushkar,??I am trying to finalize the values for our terminated transactions with ?Pacific Gas & Electric.  One outstanding item is the present value ?methodology that we use. Since all of our calculations utilize your LIBOR ?curve, legal would like to document the methodology used to derive the ?curve.  Would it be possible for you to write up a short explanation of how ?you derive the monthly forward curve for inclusion with the calculations that ?we submit to the bankruptcy court?  Please give me a call if you would like ?to discuss in greater detail.??Thanks,?Tanya???
